about.title: About Currency Converter
about.heroTitle: The Currency Converter You Actually Want to Use
about.subtitle: The Currency Converter You Actually Want to Use
about.description: A simple currency converter with offline support, built-in calculator, and multiple number formats. Quick, reliable, and private.
about.freeDescription: Free to use currency converter with no ads or tracking. Source code is available for anyone to review, modify, or learn from.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Simple features for everyday currency conversion
features.privacyDesc: No tracking, no ads, your data stays private
features.offlineDesc: Install as app, works without internet

uniqueFeatures.title: What Makes It Special
uniqueFeatures.subtitle: Features that set this currency converter apart
uniqueFeatures.calculatorDesc: Mini calculator that integrates with currency conversions. Perform calculations and directly use results in currency fields.
uniqueFeatures.numberSystemDesc: Switch between International (1,000,000) and Indian (10,00,000) number formatting systems with persistent preference storage.
uniqueFeatures.installAppDesc: Add to your device's home screen and use like a native app. Works even when you're offline.
uniqueFeatures.smartBaseDesc: Tap any exchange rate to set it as the base currency. Dynamic conversion rates update automatically across all pinned currencies.

useCases.title: Common Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Simple currency conversion for everyday scenarios
useCases.travelDesc: Convert currencies for trip budgeting and expense planning. Check how much your money is worth in different countries.
travelExamples: Convert hotel price to your currency
Check how much 1000 yen is worth
useCases.shoppingDesc: Convert prices from international websites to your local currency. Compare costs across different countries.
useCases.financeDesc: Convert currencies for personal money management, remittances, and international transactions.
useCases.workDesc: Convert client payments and project rates when working with international clients.
useCases.educationDesc: Study currency values, understand exchange rates, and learn about global economics with real data.
useCases.quickMathDesc: Use the built-in calculator for math, then convert the result to any currency.
quickMathExamples: Do math, apply result to currency

about.footerText: Made with ❤️ for currency conversion needs worldwide
